trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScriptingScriptResourceHandler" name="ScriptingScriptResourceHandler" href=""></xref> configuration section in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<scripting>" name="<scripting>" href=""></xref> element of the configuration file.
Use this type to get or set whether caching or compression is enabled for ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that are embedded as resources in an assembly.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection"></xref> class.
Gets or sets whether caching is enabled for script files that are embedded as resources in an assembly.
The EnableCaching property gets or sets the value for caching the results of the embedded script file, for caching any potential localization objects, and for caching scripts.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if caching is enabled for script files that are embedded as resources in an assembly; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets whether compression is enabled for script files that are embedded as resources in an assembly.
The EnableCompression property gets or sets the value that indicates whether the following will be compressed: - Script files that are embedded as resources in an assembly.
- Localization objects, such as string resources that are contained in a resource file (.resx).
- Scripts that are served by the script resource handler.
> [!NOTE] > If the requesting browser does not support compression, this property has no effect.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if compression is enabled for script files that are embedded as resources in an assembly; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
